text: the state prisons discipline amend rsa to read as follows discipline the commissioner of corrections may offer suitable encouragement and indulgences to those convicts who distinguish themselves by obedience industry and faithfulness and may punish any convict guilty of insolence or ill language to any officer of the prisons or guilty of obstinate and refractory behavior by solitary imprisonment not more than days at one time or by such other reasonable and effective modes of punishment and discipline as the commissioner of corrections may from time to time prescribe repeal rsa relative to the authority of a county correctional facility to discipline an inmate using close confinement is repealed
